update(Exam) - Method in class com.examapp.controllers.ExamController
PUT - Update an existing exam or create a new exam if it doesn't exist.
User - Class in com.examapp.entity
Represents a user in the system.
User() - Constructor for class com.examapp.entity.User
 
UserController - Class in com.examapp.controllers
Handles operations related to user authentication and registration. APIs available: User login requests with image verification (login) Registers a new user with an uploaded image (register) Retrieve a paginated list of students along with their associated classes (getStudentWithClasses) login and register are the only endpoint that does not require logging in.
